data.name: 'Amru Yusef Ibrahim A'bed

data.name: Muhammad 'Awadallah Mahmoud Jarbu'ah

data.name: Karam Naser Fawaz 'Ayed

data.name: Yusef Nader Suliman Idris

data.name: Ahmad 'Abd a-Rahman 'Adnan a-Rabi

data.name: Amjad Maher 'Alian Khdeir
data.notes: Shot in the chest by Border Police officers while driving by on a road leading to a checkpoint during an incident involving successive clashes between Border Police officers and youths which began during a protest against the Gaza war and included stone-throwing and fire exchanges. His brother, who was in the car with him, was injured. In the same incident, a minor was fatally shot when fleeing after throwing a Molotov cocktail, which went out immediately, at a military tower. Another Palestinian was killed when Border Police officers fired at another passing car. Later, a minor who was riding in another passing car was killed in a fire exchange that took place at the site.

data.name: Adam Amjad Fathi Joulani
data.notes: Shot in the head by Border Police officers while driving by with friends on a road leading to a checkpoint during a fire exchange between Border Police officers and armed Palestinians as part of clashes that broke out after a protest against the Gaza war. The minor who was driving the car was injured and another minor was injured when he got out of the car and tried to run away from the officers. Earlier, Border Police officers fatally shot two other Palestinians who drove by and soldiers or officers fatally shot a minor who ran away after throwing a Molotov cocktail, which went out immediately, at a military tower.

data.name: Yasser Thaer Sami Kusbah
data.notes: Fatally shot by soldiers or Border Police officers when fleeing after throwing a Molotov cocktail, which went out immediately, at a military tower at the checkpoint during clashes that broke out after a demonstration against the war in Gaza. Later, Border Police officers fatally shot three other Palestinians who were traveling on the road leading to the checkpoint in three different cars, including a minor who was in a car that drove by as the officers were engaged in a fire exchange with armed Palestinians.

data.name: Muhammad Iyad Mahmoud Hmeid
data.notes: Shot in the the back of the head by Border Police officers while driving by on a road leading to a checkpoint during in incident involving successive clashes between Border Police officers and youths which began during a protest against the Gaza war and included stone-throwing and fire exchanges. A friend who was in the car with him was inured. Before firing at Hamid, soldiers or police officers fatally shot a minor who fled after throwing a Molotov cocktail at a military tower which went out immediately. Immediately after firing at Hamid, the officers fired at another car that drove by, killing another Palestinian who did not participate in the clashes. About two hours later, when fire exchanges resumed, the officers fired at another passing car, killing a minor.

data.name: 'Imad Jareh Majed 'Adili
data.notes: Shot in the chest by soldiers when throwing a Molotov cocktail at them during clashes that broke out following a protest against the Gaza war at the entrance to the town.

data.name: 'Abd al-Halim Ibrahim 'Abd al-Halim Abu Sneineh

data.name: Muhammad Jawwad 'Abd a-Rahman Zghayyir

data.name: Ahmad 'Atef Ahmad 'Awawdeh

data.name: Mus'ab 'Abd al-Halim 'Aref Abu Ridi
data.notes: Shot in the back by settlers during clashes that broke out after the settlers attacked a home in the village with stones. During the clashes, the settlers threw stones and fired live rounds at the residents, who threw stones in an attempt to repel them. Settlers killed two more Palestinians in the incident, including a minor, and wounded a father and his five-year-old daughter. In clashes that broke out in the village afterwards, soldiers killed another Palestinian. At least 11 more Palestinians were injured that day.

The incident began when settlers, escorted by police, attacked the funeral procession of four Qusrah residents who were killed the day before, three of them, including one minor, in a settler attack and one by soldiers.

data.name: Randah 'Abdallah 'Abd al-'Aziz 'Ajaj
data.notes: Shot in the abdomen by soldiers at a flying checkpoint while riding in a car with her husband, their two sons, an infant and an 18-year-old. A B'Tselem investigation disproved the military's claim that the incident involved an attempted car attack. The investigation revealed that the father saw soldiers, apparently wearing civilian clothes, suspected they were settlers, panicked, sped up and tried to escape. The soldiers fired at least two bullets at the car, killing the mother and wounding the elder son.

data.name: Zuhdi Ziad Muhammad Mughrabi

The military claims explosive devices and blocks were thrown at the forces during the incident.

data.name: Ahmad Nayef Ahmad Nofal
data.notes: Wounded from shots fired by a settler while riding in a car with two other young men who were wounded in the shooting. The settler claimed he heard a sound resembling gunfire from the direction of their car.

data.name: Mahmoud 'Abdallah Muhammad al-fayid
data.notes: Killed by a missile fired from an aircraft while throwing explosive devices at Israeli forces during clashes that broke out following their incursion into the camp and the arrest of Palestinians. Al-Fayed was an Islamic Jihad military wing operative. Three minors were killed in the incident, including two other Islamic Jihad military wing operatives.

data.name: Muhammad Anis Mahmoud Abu Qutnah
data.notes: Killed by a missile fired from an aircraft while throwing explosive devices at Israeli forces during clashes that broke out following their incursion into the camp and the arrest of Palestinians. Abu Qutneh was an Islamic Jihad military wing operative. Three other Palestinians, including two minors, one of them an Islamic Jihad military wing operative, were killed in the incident.

data.name: Muhammad Qadri Jamal Sabah
data.notes: Killed by a missile fired from an aircraft while throwing explosive devices at Israeli forces during clashes that broke out following their incursion into the camp and the arrest of Palestinians. Sabah was an Islamic Jihad military wing operative. Three other Palestinians, including two Islamic Jihad military wing operatives, one of them a minor, and another minor were killed in the incident.

data.name: 'Eid Nabil 'Eid Mar'i
data.notes: Killed by a missile fired from an aircraft while throwing explosive devices at Israeli forces during clashes that broke out following their incursion into the camp and the arrest of Palestinians. Three Islamic Jihad military wing operatives were killed in the incident, including two minors.

data.name: Hamzah Hazem Ahmad Nazzal
data.notes: Shot in the chest by soldiers and Border Police officers who entered the town and arrested residents. Nazzal was throwing stones at the forces, along with other youths.

data.name: Khaled Salam Saleh Fuqahaa
data.notes: Wounded in the thigh from shots fired by a soldier who came out of a jeep as al-Fuqahaa was fleeing after throwing stones and military jeeps that drove through the village.

data.name: Ahmad Ghaleb Ribhe Mteir
data.notes: Fatally shot by soldiers while watching from the roof of his house together with relatives as Israeli forces left the camp after arresting 14 Palestinians. According to the military, while the Israeli forces operated in the camp, youths threw explosive devices and blocks at them and burned tires. Mteir's evacuation for medical treatment was delayed for about 15 minutes because the Israeli forces blocked the exit from the camp.

data.name: Usayed Hamzah Mahmoud Hmeidat
data.notes: Shot in the abdomen by soldiers while throwing stones at them along with other youths during clashes that broke out when the soldiers entered the camp to close a gate installed by the military that cuts off the home of an extended family from the camp. The settlement of Beit El was built near the home. The soldiers later shot another minor, wounding him.

data.name: 'Abdallah Bassam Mahmoud Abu al-Heija
data.notes: Shot in the chest while firing at soldiers during a fire exchange that broke out after soldiers and undercover Border Police officers entered the camp and arrested Palestinians. A senior Islamic Jihad military wing operative and a minor who threw an explosive device were also killed in the fire exchange.

data.name: Jawwad 'Abd a-Salam Turki Qatban
data.notes: Shot in the back and chest by Israeli forces after throwing stones at them during clashes, which included fire exchanges, that broke out after soldiers and undercover Border Police officers entered the camp and arrested Palestinians. Two armed men, including a senior Islamic Jihad military wing operative were killed in the fire exchange.

data.name: Aysar Muhammad Ibrahim al-'Amer
data.notes: Fatally shot while firing at soldiers during a fire exchange that broke out after soldiers and undercover Border Police officers entered the camp and arrested Palestinians. Another armed man and a minor who threw an explosive device were also killed in the fire exchange. Al-'Amer was a senior Islamic Jihad military wing operative.

data.name: Qassam Ousamah 'Adel Zeid
data.notes: A muezzin at al-Fatah mosque. Shot in the chest by soldiers while leaving the mosque during morning prayers to move his motorbike, after he heard armed Palestinians in the area shooting at soldiers. The soldiers entered the city to demolish a shop as punishment and to arrest a Palestinian.

data.name: Bilal Muhammad Shahin Saleh
data.notes: Fatally shot by a soldier in plainclothes who arrived with settlers at Saleh’s family olive grove and tried to drive out family members who were harvesting olives.

data.name: Ramah Jalal a-Din Taleb Qatishat
data.notes: Shot in the thighs by Israeli forces while throwing stones at them during clashes, which included fire exchanges, that broke out after Border Police, soldiers and Shin Bet entered the town and arrested Palestinians. Three more Palestinians were injured in the incident.

data.name: Rasmi Fayez Hassan 'Arafat
data.notes: Shot in the abdomen by soldiers and Border Police officers while driving two other military wing operatives, who were injured, after they fired at the forces during their incursion into the camp area. The clashes broke out following a punitive house demolition in ‘Askar R.C., where Israeli forces killed another Palestinian. The clashes in Balatah included stones and explosive devices being thrown at security forces. Died of his wounds shortly after. 'Arafat was an Islamic Jihad military wing operative.

data.name: Naser 'Abd a-Latif 'Izat Barghuthi
data.notes: Shot in the abdomen by soldiers who emerged from an ambush while he was watching tracking the movement of military jeeps along with other youths and advancing towards them. The soldiers wounded 11 other youths who were with him. According to the military, Palestinians threw Molotov cocktails and explosive devices at the soldiers.

data.name: Hussein Yusef Hussein Dar Rabi'
data.notes: Fatally shot by soldiers and Border Police officers while throwing stones at them from a roof during clashes that broke out after the forces entered the camp and arrested a Palestinian.

data.name: Na'im Mahmoud 'Abd a-Salam Faran
data.notes: Shot in the abdomen by soldiers and Border Police officers as he emerged from behind a street corner while the forces were carrying out a punitive house demolition. During the demolition, clashes broke out involving stone-throwing tire-burning, throwing of explosive devices and shots fired at the forces. Clashes also broke out in the nearby Balata R.C., during which another Palestinian was killed and two were injured.

data.name: Yamen Kamal Ahmad 'Atiq
data.notes: Wounded by gunfire shot by soldiers and Border Police while clashing with them along with other youths after the forces entered the city and, according to media reports, arrested four Palestinians. According to the military, during the clashes the Palestinians threw explosives at the forces and exchanged fire with them.

data.name: Nawras Ibrahim Zidan Ba'jawi
data.notes: Wounded in the back while participating in fire exchanges that developed between armed Palestinians and military, Border Police and Shin Bet forces after the forces entered the camp. A another Islamic Jihad military wing operative and another armed Palestinian were also killed in the fire exchange. An armed Palestinian minor was killed by a missile strike. Ba'jawi died a short while later.

data.name: Amir 'Abdallah Khalil Kulab Shurbaji
data.notes: Wounded in the shoulder and arm while participating in fire exchanges that developed between armed Palestinians and military, Border Police and Shin Bet forces after the forces entered the camp. Two Islamic Jihad military wing operatives were also fatally shot during a fire exchange and an armed Palestinian minor was killed by a missile strike. Shurbaji died shortly after.

data.name: Wiam Iyad Ahmad al-Hanun
data.notes: Killed in a fire exchange that developed between armed Palestinians and military, Border Police and Shin Bet forces that entered the camp. Two other armed Palestinians were killed in fire exchanges during the incident, an Islamic Jihad military wing operative and another armed operative. An armed Palestinian minor was killed by a missile strike.

data.name: Adam Naser Mahmoud Abu al-Hawa
data.notes: Fatally shot by Border Police officers at the end of a short chase on foot after he stabbed a Border Police officer. According to media reports, the officer was severely wounded. Israel is holding his body.

data.name: Fouad Isma'il Mahmoud Abu Sabhah
data.notes: A man with an intellectual disability. Shot in the neck by soldiers while throwing stones at them along with other youths who retreated in the meantime.

data.name: Musa Khaled Musa Jabarin
data.notes: Killed by a missile strike while participating in clashes that included fire exchanges and explosive device throwing during an incursion into the camp by soldiers, Border Police officers and Shin Bet. Three armed Palestinians were killed in the fire exchange, including two other Islamic Jihad military wing operatives.

data.name: Muhammad 'Abd al-Qader Jaber Kharaz
data.notes: Wounded in the buttock and leg by shots fired by soldiers in ambush as he was about to throw a stone at a military jeep that was passing by, near the site of clashes between the soldiers and the Palestinians. Two other Palestinians who were driving by were injured in the incident, including a minor who died of his injuries on 2 November 2023.

data.name: Hamdan 'Omar Mahmoud Hamdan
data.notes: Wounded in the head from shots fired by soldiers at whom Palestinian youths were throwing stones, while driving by with his uncle. His uncle was lightly injured by the gunfire. A minor who was about to throw a stone at one of the jeeps passing through the area was injured during the clashes and died of his injuries on 31 October 2023.

data.name: Rawhi Rashid 'Abdallah Sawaftah
data.notes: Shot in the head by Israeli forces while sitting at the entrance to a store during clashes, which included fire exchanges, that broke out after the forces entered the city and arrested five Palestinians. At least nine more Palestinians were injured by the soldiers' fire.

data.name: 'Abd a-Rahman Muhammad Hassan al-Jawabrah
data.notes: Shot in the chest by soldiers who were standing on the roof of a house while throwing stones at soldiers on the ground along with other youths during clashes that developed after a demonstration against the war in Gaza.

data.name: 'Assem Jihad Mustafa Ramadan
data.notes: Wounded in the back by soldiers’ fire while standing on the street in the center of the village with other youths, during the soldiers’ incursion into the village. Several residents threw stones at the soldiers. Another youth was injured by soldiers’ gunfire in the western part of the village.

data.name: Majdi Zakaria Yusef 'Awwad
data.notes: A man with an intellectual disability. Shot in the upper body by Israeli forces while walking in the street after the Israeli forces entered the city and arrested a Palestinian.

data.name: Yanal Ahmad Tawfiq Hamran
data.notes: Member of the Palestinian Authority security forces. Shot in the head while participating in a fire exchange with soldiers and Border Police officers who had entered the camp and arrested Palestinians. Two more Palestinians who participated in the fire exchange, one of them a member of the Palestinian Authority security forces, were killed by a missile fired from an aircraft.

data.name: Muhammad Yunes Muhammad Jarar
data.notes: Member of the Palestinian Authority security forces. Killed by a missile fired from an aircraft while participating in a fire exchange with soldiers and Border Police officers who had entered the camp and arrested Palestinians. Two more Palestinians who participated in the fire exchange, one of them a member of the Palestinian Authority security forces, were also killed, one by a firearm and the other by the missile.

data.name: Wiam Ahmad Fayad Hariri
data.notes: Killed by a missile fired from an aircraft while participating in a fire exchange with soldiers and Border Police officers who had entered the camp and arrested Palestinians. Two more Palestinians, both members of the Palestinian Authority security forces were killed in the incident, while participating in the fire exchange. One was killed by a firearm and the other by the missile.

data.name: Elchanan Klein
data.notes: Fatally shot by Palestinians from a car that overtook his car on Route 557.

data.name: Qusai Mazyoon Mahmoud Qur'an
data.notes: נורה למוShot in the head by Israeli forces while throwing stones at them during clashes that broke out after they entered the camp and included gunfire. According to the Palestinian Ministry of Health, two more Palestinians, one of them a minor, were injured by the Israeli forces' fire.

data.name: Suleiman Muhammad Suleiman Isteiti
data.notes: Fatally shot by soldiers along with another armed Palestinian, during a fire exchange that broke out after the Israeli forces entered the camp and arrested a Palestinian. Several hours later, another Palestinian was fatally shot while standing on the balcony of his house watching the military jeeps leaving the camp. Two Islamic Jihad military wing operatives, one of them a minor and the other a Palestinian citizen of Israel, were killed by a missile strike.

data.name: Jihad Ibrahim Hamad Mustafa (Naghnaghiyah)
data.notes: Shot in the chest and abdomen by soldiers, along with another armed Palestinian during a fire exchange that broke out after the Israeli forces entered the camp and arrested a Palestinian. Several hours later, another Palestinian was fatally shot while standing on the balcony of his house watching the military jeeps leaving the camp. Two Islamic Jihad military wing operatives, one of them a minor and the other a Palestinian citizen of Israel, were killed by a missile strike.

data.name: Yazan 'Othman Baker Shiha
data.notes: Fatally shot by soldiers while watching clashes that broke out during their retreat from the city, after arresting three Palestinians. One minor was killed by soldier fire during clashes in the area and two other Palestinians were wounded.

data.name: Ayham Muhammad Talal Shaf'i
data.notes: Shot in the chest by soldiers while trying to find cover after throwing stones at them with other teens as the soldiers were retreating from the city after arresting three Palestinians. Two other Palestinians were wounded by soldier fire during the clashes and another Palestinian who was watching the clashes was fatally shot.

data.name: Rami 'Iz Musa 'Odeh
data.notes: Wounded by soldiers’ gunfire while standing on his balcony during their withdrawal from the town after arresting Palestinians.

data.name: Muhammad Wael 'Ata al-Ja'bari
data.notes: Fatally shot by soldiers when throwing stones at them during clashes that broke out following a protest against the Gaza war.

data.name: Hamzah Zayed 'Eid Sawaftah
data.notes: Fatally shot by soldiers at a checkpoint, after, according to the military, speeding towards them on his car and then getting out of it holding a knife. Israel is holding his body.

data.name: Muhammad Sa'id 'Abd al-Qader al-'Azzah
data.notes: Wounded by soldiers or Border Police officers, while on the street during clashes that broke out after the Israeli forces entered homes in the camp, as well as a lathe, from which they confiscated equipment. Died of his wounds shortly after. During the clashes, Palestinians threw stones and Molotov cocktails at the Israeli forces. Eleven more Palestinians were wounded by the gunfire and a member of the Palestinian Authority security forces was killed while watching the forces retreat from the roof of his house.

data.name: Wadi' Yihya Hassan Najjar
data.notes: Member of the Palestinian Authority security forces. Fatally shot by a soldier or a Border Police officer from the balcony of a nearby building, while standing on his rooftop with his brother, watching Israeli forces exit the camp after confiscating equipment from a lathe. During the clashes that developed in the area, Palestinians threw stones and Molotov cocktails and the Israeli forces shot and wounded 12 Palestinians. One of the wounded men, who did not participate in the clashes, died of his wounds shortly after.

data.name: Ibrahim Zuheir Ibrahim Zayed
data.notes: Shot in the back by Border Police officers when trying to flee them after advancing towards them in the street together with other youths, some of whom threw stones. Most of the soldiers and officers had already retreated from the camp by then. The forces entered the camp to seal a printing press as a punitive measure and arrest Palestinians.

data.name: Yamen Mahmoud Nabil Jarar
data.notes: Killed by a missile fired from an aircraft while participating in a fire exchange with soldiers who had entered the camp and arrested Palestinians. Another Islamic Jihad military wing operative, a Palestinian citizen of Israel, was also killed by a missile. A few hours earlier, the soldiers killed two other armed men. Another Palestinian who was standing on the balcony of his house watching the military jeeps leaving the camp was fatally shot in the city of Jenin.

data.name: Wasim Ahmad Salim Zyud
data.notes: Palestinian citizen of Israel. Killed by a missile fired from an aircraft while participating in a fire exchange with soldiers who had entered the camp and arrested Palestinians. Another Islamic Jihad military wing operative, a minor, was also killed by a missile. A few hours earlier, the soldiers killed two other armed men. Another Palestinian who was standing on the balcony of his house watching the military jeeps leaving the camp was fatally shot in the city of Jenin.

data.name: Yusef Muhammad Yusef Shahin
data.notes: Fatally shot by soldiers when leaving Friday prayers at the mosque along with other Palestinians, some of whom threw stones at soldiers who had entered the village shortly before.

data.name: Mu'taz Ahmad Mahmoud Abu Nada
data.notes: Shot in the head by soldiers while standing on the balcony of his house watching military jeeps leaving Jenin R.C. after soldiers arrested a Palestinian there. Several hours earlier, two Palestinians were fatally shot during a fire exchange with soldiers, and two Islamic Jihad military wing operatives, one a minor and one a Palestinian citizen of Israel, were killed by a missile fired from an Israeli aircraft.

data.name: Ahmad Habes 'Abdallah a-Dabbas
data.notes: Wounded by soldiers’ fire while throwing stones at them along with other youths as the soldiers withdrew from the village after arresting workers from Gaza who had been there since the war broke out. Died of his wounds shortly after. Two other youths were injured in the shooting.

data.name: Nabil 'Abd a-Ra'uf 'Ali Halabiyah
data.notes: Fatally shot by soldiers and Border Police officers who surrounded a house he barricaded himself in. An exchange of fire developed between Halabiyah and the Israeli forces, during which the forces fired an anti-tank missile at the house. A Palestinian present near the house and another Palestinian who tried to evacuate an injured person there, were fatally shot by the Israeli forces. During clashes that broke out in the area, Palestinians threw stones and improvised explosive devices at the Israeli forces. Halabiyah was a Hamas military wing operative. Israel is holding his body.

data.name: Muhannad Ahmad Dawood 'Afanah
data.notes: Fatally shot by soldiers and Border Police officers in a street near a house where he barricaded himself and where, a short time before, a Hamas military wing operative was fatally shot. Another Palestinian was fatally shot when he tried to evacuate a wounded man. During clashes that broke out in the area, Palestinians threw stones and improvised explosive devices at the Israeli forces.

data.name: Musa Diyaa a-Din Musa al-Haj Hassan
data.notes: Fatally shot by soldiers and Border Police officers while trying to rescue a wounded man near a house where a short time before, a Hamas military wing operative was killed when Israeli forces surrounded a house he barricaded himself in. Another Palestinian was fatally shot near the house. Clashes broke out in the area in which Palestinians threw stones and improvised explosive devices at the Israeli forces.

data.name: Rose Lubin
data.notes: Critically wounded when a Palestinian minor stabbed her and another police officer who was lightly wounded. The stabber was fatally shot by Border Police officers.

data.name: Mus'ab Mujahed Kamel Matari
data.notes: Fatally shot by soldiers while near the separation fence officers with other youths. His body was found shortly after.

data.name: Yusef Jalal Mahmoud Ahmad
data.notes: Wounded by soldiers' fire while participating in clashes during which Palestinians threw stones and launched fireworks at the soldiers after they entered the village. Died a short while later.

data.name: Muamen Saed Jamil Mahmoud
data.notes: Palestinian citizen of Israel. Fatally shot by members of the Special Police Unit and the Shin Bet while riding in a car with three other Palestinian men, one a senior Hamas military wing operative, one a senior al-Aqsa Martyrs' Brigade operative, and another an al-Aqsa Martyrs' Brigade operative. All three were also killed. Bel'awi was an al-Aqsa Martyrs' Brigade operative.

data.name: Qassem Muhammad Mustafa Rajab
data.notes: Fatally shot by members of the Special Police Unit and the Shin Bet while riding in a car with three other men, one a senior Hamas military wing operative, one a senior al-Aqsa Martyrs' Brigade operative, and another al-Aqsa Martyrs' Brigade operative who was a Palestinian citizen of Israel. All three were also killed. Rajab was an al-Aqsa Martyrs' Brigade operative.

data.name: Jihad Mihraj Ibrahim Shihadah
data.notes: Fatally shot by members of the Special Police Unit and the Shin Bet while riding in a car with three other men, one a senior Hamas military wing operative and two al-Aqsa Martyrs' Brigade operatives, one of whom was a Palestinian citizen of Israel. All three were also killed. Shhadeh was a senior al-Aqsa Martyrs' Brigade operative.

data.name: 'Iz a-Din Raed Hussein 'Awwad
data.notes: Fatally shot by members of the Special Police Unit and the Shin Bet while riding in a car with three other men, all of whom were al-Aqsa Martyrs' Brigade operatives. One was a senior operative and another was a Palestinian citizen of Israel. All three were also killed. 'Awwad was a senior Hamas military wing operative.

data.name: Mahmoud Ahmad Mahmoud al-Atrash
data.notes: Wounded by Israeli forces’ gunfire while participating in clashes that included stone-throwing and broke out after soldiers entered homes in the town and arrested Palestinians. Died of his wounds shortly after. According to media reports, at least five more Palestinians were wounded by the Israeli forces’ fire in the clashes.

data.name: Muhammad 'Omar Ghanam Froukh
data.notes: Fatally shot by Border Police officers after stabbing two of them, critically wounding one and lightly wounding another. The critically wounded officer died of her injuries later that day. Israel is holding his body.

data.name: 'Abd al-Karim Ibrahim Mahmoud Qarariyah
data.notes: Member of the Palestinian Authority security forces. Wounded in the head by shots fired by armed Palestinians during an arrest operation in the camp.

data.name: Sa'ed Nimer Hussein al-Froukh
data.notes: Wounded by Israeli forces’ fire while throwing stones at them along with other youths while the soldiers were surveying a house designated for punitive demolition. Died a short while later. According to the military, the youths threw Molotov cocktails at the forces. Two other youths were injured in the shooting.

data.name: Muhammad Farid Hamdan Thawabtah
data.notes: Wounded by soldiers’ gunfire while standing in the street, watching clashes that broke out after the soldiers entered the city and surrounded a house to arrest a Palestinian. The Palestinian turned himself in to the forces the next day, after his family members were detained at home for several hours.

data.name: Sharif Ahmad 'Abd a-Rahim Sha'er
data.notes: Wounded in the pelvis by military and Border Police gunfire during a fire exchange that broke out after the Israeli forces entered the camp and arrested more than 20 Palestinians. Fifteen other Palestinians were killed, either on the spot or later from wounds they sustained, by the Israeli forces’ gunfire, including four more minors, one of them an operative with an armed group, and eight other members of armed groups.

data.name: Muhammad 'Ali Sa'id 'Aweis
data.notes: Wounded in the chest and abdomen by shots fired by soldiers and Border Police officers during a fire exchange that broke out after they entered the camp and arrested more than 20 Palestinians. Fifteen other Palestinians were killed, either on the spot or later from wounds they sustained, by the Israeli forces’ gunfire, including five minors, one of them an operative with an armed group, and eight other members of armed groups.

data.name: Jamal Mahmoud 'Abd a-Rahman Masharqah
data.notes: Wounded by a missile fired from an aircraft while participating in a fire exchange with soldiers and Border Police officers, which broke outafter their incursion into the camp and the arrest of more than 20 Palestinians. Fifteen other Palestinians were killed, either on the spot or later from wounds they sustained, by the Israeli forces’ gunfire, including five minors, one of them an operative with an armed group, and seven other members of armed groups. Masharqah was an al-Aqsa Martyrs' Brigade operative.

data.name: Muhammad 'Ali Muhammad 'Eziyah

The military soon after notified the family their son had died of his wounds and his body was handed over to them later that morning at the a-Nashash checkpoint. The military claims that during operations in ‘Ayidah R.C. and a-Duheisheh R.C. that day, Palestinians threw Molotov cocktails and explosive devices at the soldiers.

Khalaf was an Islamic Jihad military wing operative.

data.notes: Wounded by Israeli soldiers’ gunfire while throwing stones at them along with other youths during clashes that broke out after the soldiers entered the village. data.name: Mu'tasem Fawaz Mustafa Yusef
data.notes: Shot in the neck by soldiers while trying to cross the separation fence and enter Israel to look for work.

data.name: Muhannad 'Abd al-Qader Muhammad Jad al-Haq
data.notes: Shot in the abdomen by Border Police officers while walking down the street on his way to work after the officers and soldiers entered the camp and arrested two Palestinians. data.name: Yasin 'Abdallah Hussni Asmar

Clashes that broke out in the area, in which Asmar did not participate, included stone and Molotov cocktail throwing. After he was shot, the officer fired at anyone who tried to come to his aid until he left the area.

data.name: Ahmad Mustafa 'Abed 'Asi

The settlers invaded the village accompanied by soldiers, grazed their sheep there, set fire to two cars and burned down a house. Clashes developed between them and village residents, which included mutual stone throwing. Local residents discovered his body in a grove later. Three Palestinians were wounded by the gunfire.

data.name: 'Adnan 'Issam 'Adnan Zeid
data.notes: Wounded by soldiers’ fire on his way to work at a bakery, after seeing them enter the town and trying to flee them. Security camera footage and a video clip posted on social media show Zeid fleeing the soldiers, being shot, getting up and being shot again. Died of his wounds shortly after.

data.name: 'Ali Ibrahim Muhammad 'Alqam
data.notes: Member of the Palestinian Authority security forces. Shot in the chest by Israeli armed forces from a distance of about 130 meters as he emerged around a street corner where he had been waiting with about 15 other local residents for the forces to leave the camp. A short time earlier, Palestinians fired at the forces following clashes that broke out in the nearby neighborhood of Kafr ‘Aqab, after soldiers, Border Police officers, Israel Police officers, Poultry Board and Israel Nature and Parks Authority personnel entered the neighborhood and confiscated vehicles and goods. Alkam, who was an al-Aqsa Martyrs’ Brigade operative, died of his wounds shortly after.

data.name: Anas Isma'il Muhammad Froukh
data.notes: Wounded by shots fired by soldiers who entered the town and took up positions in a construction site, while on his way home. The soldiers also fired at another Palestinian who approached the wounded Froukh to help him. Both died of their wounds a short while later.

data.name: Muhammad Sa'di Jum'ah Froukh
data.notes: Wounded by shots fired by soldiers who entered the town and took up positions in a construction site when he approached another Palestinian who had been shot by the soldiers to help him. Both died of their wounds a short while later.

data.name: Anas Yusef Ibrahim Dawood
data.notes: Killed along with a Palestinian citizen of Israel who was a senior al-Aqsa Martyrs' Brigade operative in a fire exchange that developed between them and soldiers, Border Police officers and Gidonim Unit police officers during a chase. Israel is holding his body. Dawood was an al-Aqsa Martyrs' Brigade operative. According to media reports, two more Palestinians were injured by the Israeli forces' fire.

data.name: 'Alaa Marwan Salim Nazzal
data.notes: Palestinian citizen of Israel. Killed along with another al-Aqsa Martyrs' Brigade operative in a fire exchange that developed between them and soldiers, Border Police officers and Gidonim Unit police officers during a chase. Israel is holding his body. Nazzal was a senior al-Aqsa Martyrs' Brigade operative. According to media reports, two more Palestinians were injured by the Israeli forces' fire.

data.name: Muhammad Yusef Hassan Manasrah
data.notes: Killed while sitting in his parents’ living room when soldiers blew up the apartment door. Manasrah was hit by the door, which flew onto him and hit his neck, and by explosive fragments. The soldiers raided the extended Manasrah family residence and blew up the doors of all the apartments. Manasrah’s mother and one of his brothers were injured by fragments. The soldiers then entered the apartment, searched it, ignoring Manasrah, who was lying in a pool of blood on the living room floor, and arrested one of his brothers.

data.name: Mu'az Ibrahim 'Ali Zahran
data.notes: Fatally shot by Israeli forces while throwing stones at them during clashes that broke out after the forces entered the camp and arrested Palestinians. During the clashes, Palestinians fired at the Israeli forces. Another contingent of Israeli armed forces entered the nearby town of Tammun, arrested three Palestinians and killed a minor who participated in stone throwing during clashes that broke out due to the incursion. According to media reports, 11 more Palestinians were injured by the Israeli forces' fire in the town and the camp, including at least one minor.

data.name: 'Omar Mahmoud Sadeq Abu Baker
data.notes: Shot in the chest by Israeli forces when throwing stones at them during clashes in which Palestinian youths threw improvised explosive devices and fired at the forces that entered the town. According to media reports, three more Palestinians were injured by the Israeli forces' fire. Died of his wounds shortly after.

data.name: 'Abd a-Rahman 'Imad Khaled Bani 'Odeh
data.notes: Killed by Israeli forces’ fire while throwing stones and burning tires during clashes that broke out after a military, Border Police and Shin Bet force entered the town and arrested three Palestinians. During clashes that developed in the area, armed Palestinians fired and threw explosive devices at the forces. Another contingent of Israeli armed forces entered the nearby al-Far’ah R.C., arrested Palestinians, and, during the clashes that broke out there, killed a Palestinian youth who threw stones at them. According to media reports, 11 more Palestinians were injured by the Israeli forces' fire in the town and the camp, including at least one minor.

data.name: Qassem Muhammad Mustafa Daraghmeh
data.notes: Wounded in the chest by shots fired by soldiers or Shin Bet forces near his home, during clashes that broke out after they entered the camp and arrested two Palestinians. During the clashes, Palestinian youths placed obstacles on the road, threw stones and explosive devices at the Israeli forces and fired at them. Died of his wounds shortly after. Five other Palestinians, including a minor and two Islamic Jihad military wing operatives, were killed in a fire exchange and six Palestinians were wounded. One of the wounded died of his wounds the next day.

data.name: Baraa Nabil Muhammad al-Amir
data.notes: Shot in the head with another Islamic Jihad military wing operative during a fire exchange that broke out between armed Palestinians and Israeli soldiers and Shin Bet forces who entered the camp and arrested two Palestinians. Three other Palestinians, including one minor, were killed in the clashes, during which Palestinians placed obstacles on roads, threw stones and explosive devices at the Israeli forces and fired at them. Six Palestinians were injured. One of them died of his wounds the next day. Another Palestinian who did not participate in the clashes was shot by soldiers at short range when he was hiding behind a car in the yard next to his house.

data.name: 'Amer Bassem Mahmoud Subuh
data.notes: Shot in the head with another Islamic Jihad military wing operative during a fire exchange that broke out between armed Palestinians and Israeli soldiers and Shin Bet forces who entered the camp and arrested two Palestinians. Three other Palestinians, including one minor, were killed in the clashes, during which Palestinians placed obstacles on roads, threw stones and explosive devices at the Israeli forces and fired at them. Six Palestinians were injured. One of them died of his wounds the next day. Another Palestinian who did not participate in the clashes was shot by soldiers at short range when he was hiding behind a car in the yard next to his house.

data.name: Thaer 'Abdallah Yusef Shahin
data.notes: Shot in the chest by soldiers from inside a military jeep that entered a yard near his home, while hiding behind a car after going into the yard to help a wounded man. The jeep approached the car behind which Shahin was hiding and the driver opened the door and shot him from a distance of about two meters. Earlier, the soldiers in the jeep fired at another Palestinian who was running away from them after throwing stones at them. The man was wounded and fell down. Then the jeep approached him and the driver and another soldier fired several more shots at him at short range. He died of his wounds the next day. The soldiers and Shin Bet personnel entered the camp earlier that morning, arrested two Palestinians and killed three others, including a minor, during clashes. During these clashes, Palestinians placed obstacles on the roads and threw stones and explosive devices at the Israeli forces and fired at them. Two Islamic Jihad military wing operatives were also killed in a fire exchange with the Israeli forces. Five other Palestinians were injured by Israeli forces’ fire during clashes.

data.name: Maher 'Abdallah Ahmad Jawabreh
data.notes: Shot in the head by soldiers or Shin Bet forces while throwing stones at them during clashes that broke out after they entered the camp and arrested two Palestinians. During the clashes, Palestinian youths placed obstacles on the road, threw stones and explosive devices at the Israeli forces and fired at them. Five other Palestinians, including two Islamic Jihad military wing operatives, were killed in a fire exchange and six Palestinians were wounded. One of the wounded died of his wounds the next day.

data.name: 'Imad Nihad Khaled Jawabreh

Five other Palestinians, including a minor and two Islamic Jihad military wing operatives, were killed in a fire exchange and six Palestinians were wounded. One of the wounded died of his wounds the next day.

data.name: Rami Jamal Rushdi al-Jindeb
data.notes: Wounded by shots fired by soldiers from inside a military jeep as he was fleeing them, holding a fire extinguisher, after having thrown stones at them when they entered the camp with Shin Bet personnel and arrested two Palestinians. Al-Jindib fell wounded on the ground and then the jeep approached him and the driver and another soldier fired several more shots at him at short range. The driver then took a picture of him lying in a pool of blood and the jeep drove off. Earlier, the driver of the jeep fired at another Palestinian who was hiding behind a car at short range. The soldiers and Shin Bet personnel entered the camp earlier that morning, arrested two Palestinians and killed three others, including a minor, during clashes. During these clashes, Palestinians placed obstacles on the roads and threw stones and explosive devices at the Israeli forces and fired at them. Two Islamic Jihad military wing operatives were also killed in a fire exchange with the Israeli forces. Five other Palestinians were injured by Israeli forces’ fire during clashes.

data.name: Sari Yusef 'Abd al-Qader 'Amru
data.notes: Killed by shots fired by soldiers or Border Police officers who entered his home. According to the military, ‘Amru fired at Israeli forces two days earlier at Khursah Junction, and attacked the forces that came to arrest him with a knife, moderately injuring one of them. The forces arrested ‘Amru brother. Israel is holding his body.

data.name: Fouad 'Imad Fayez 'Abahrah
data.notes: Shot in the pelvis while participating in a fire exchange near Horse Square in Jenin R.C., during an invasion of the city of Jenin and Jenin R.C. by the military, Border Police and Shin Bet that lasted about three days. ‘Abahreh was an Islamic Jihad military wing operative. Five other activists in armed groups were killed the day, including two minors. Four of them were hit by missile fired from an aircraft and one was shot during a fire exchange. Over the next two days, seven more Palestinians were killed or died of their wounds, including two minors and three operatives in armed groups, and dozens of Palestinians were arrested.

Zidan was an Islamic Jihad military wing operative. Over the next two days, 12 more Palestinians were killed or died of their wounds, including four minors, two of them operatives in armed groups, and five other operatives, and dozens of Palestinians were arrested.

data.name: Rihab Mustafa Muhammad Yosef
data.notes: A cancer patient who was wounded by fragments inside an ambulance that was taking her home from the hospital, during clashes in which a minor who threw stones and tried to throw an improvised explosive device at military jeeps near the hospital was fatally shot. That day, four more Palestinians, a minor and three armed operatives, were struck by a missile fired from an aircraft and either killed or wounded and died of their wounds later. In the remaining two days of the invasion, six more Palestinians were killed, all operatives of armed groups, two of them minors. Dozens of Palestinians were arrested.

data.name: Hamzah Ibrahim Muhammad Bushkar
data.notes: Killed by Israeli soldiers’ fire from a military post near ‘Awarta. According to the military, he attempted to stab the soldiers at the post. Israel is holding his body.

data.name: 'Aziz 'Abd a-Rahim 'Aziz Ekhlayel
data.notes: Wounded by shots fired by soldiers while throwing stones at them with other youths during clashes that developed after they entered the town and confiscated unlicensed vehicles. Died of his wounds shortly after.

data.name: Salim Naser Salim Hajar
data.notes: Shot in the head by soldiers emerging from an ambush while trying to flee on foot with his brother and other laborers after the soldiers stopped the car they were in. The two brothers had crossed through a breach in the separation fence on their way to the family’s plant in Barta'ah a-Sharqiyah, a village trapped in an enclave by the Separation Fence, after Israel had denied them access to it since October 7. His brother was arrested. Israel held his body until 28 January 2024.

data.name: 'Atallah Ziad 'Atallah Badahah
data.notes: Shot in the chest by soldiers while present in an area where clashes erupted between them and Palestinian youths who threw stones at them as they retreated from Deir ‘Ammar R.C. According to the military, the forces entered the camp during a chase after Palestinians who threw Molotov cocktails at them. Soldiers at a fly checkpoint detained the car in which Badhah was evacuated for about 10 minutes. Died of his wounds shortly after. Two more Palestinians were wounded by soldiers’ fire during the clashes.

data.name: Walid 'Abd a-Razeq As'ad Zahrah
data.notes: Killed by a missile fired from an aircraft along with his cousin and a friend while the three were standing at the friend’s doorway as armed Palestinians fired from the site at soldiers and Border Police officers who had entered the camp a short time before. About three hours earlier, two Islamic Jihad military wing operatives were killed by a missile in the al-Manshiyah neighborhood in the camp. The Israeli forces arrested at least four Palestinians in the camp.

data.name: Ghayth Yasser Raja Shihadah
data.notes: Killed by a missile fired from an aircraft along with another Islamic Jihad military wing operative after, according to the military, they fired and threw explosive devices at soldiers and Border Police officers who entered the camp. Three other Palestinians were killed by another missile near the camp’s main road about three hours later. The Israeli forces arrested at least four Palestinians in the camp.

data.name: As'ad Fathi As'ad Zahrah
data.notes: Killed by a missile fired from an aircraft along with his cousin and a friend while the three were standing at the friend’s doorway as armed Palestinians fired from the site at soldiers and Border Police officers who had entered the camp a short time before. data.name: Tareq Maher Ragheb a-Shakhshir
data.notes: Wounded by Israeli forces’ fire while throwing stones with other youths at military jeeps entering the city center. A-Shakhsher was a Lion’s Den operative.

data.name: Rashed Habib Ahmad 'Aydi
data.notes: Shot in the shoulder while watching, with other residents, clashes that erupted near his home between local residents and soldiers who entered the camp and arrested a Palestinian. During the clashes, in which Palestinians threw stones and explosive devices at the soldiers and fired at them, another minor, who was an Islamic Jihad military wing operative, was killed while throwing an improvised explosive device. Two brothers were killed while participating in a fire exchange with the soldiers.

data.name: Hikmat Samir Muhammad Milhem
data.notes: Shot in the head and killed along with his brother, while the two participating in a fire exchange with soldiers who had entered the camp and arrested Palestinians. During the Israeli forces’ incursion into the camp, other Palestinians threw stones and explosive devices at the soldiers and fired at them. The soldiers’ fire also killed two minors, one of whom was watching the clashes. The other, who was an Islamic Jihad military wing operative, was killed while throwing an improvised explosive device at the soldiers.

data.name: Muhammad Samir Muhammad Milhem

data.name: Yazan Mu'in Muhammad Khatib
data.notes: Shot in the head while throwing an improvised explosive device during clashes that erupted between local residents and soldiers who entered the camp and arrested a Palestinian. Two brothers were killed while participating in a fire exchange with the soldiers and another minor was killed while watching the clashes near his home. Khatib was an Islamic Jihad military wing operative.

data.name: Mahmoud Muhammad 'Issa Za'ul
data.notes: Fatally shot by soldiers while trying to throw a Molotov cocktail at them during clashes that broke out after they entered the village. According to media reports, 11 more Palestinians were injured by the soldiers’ fire, including a minor.

data.name: Basel Wajih 'Abd al-'Afo al-Muhtaseb
data.notes: Fatally shot by soldiers at the entrance to town, after, according to the military, trying to run them over. In a video posted on social media, soldiers are seen firing at al-Muhtaseb’s car after it crashed into a fence on the side of the road. Israel is holding his body.

data.name: Ahmad Muhammad Yusef Yaghi
data.notes: Wounded by shots fired by Israeli forces from the roof of an unfinished building while on his neighbors’ roof, watching clashes that broke out after the forces entered the camp. Palestinian youths threw stones and launched firecrackers at the forces during the clashes. Yaghi was evacuated in a car because the military blocked the entrance to the camp and ambulances could not reach him. Died of his wounds shortly after. Another Palestinian was fatally shot on the roof of his house.

data.name: Ibrahim Majed 'Abd al-Majid a-Titi
data.notes: Fatally shot by Israeli forces from the balcony of a building while on his roof, watching clashes that broke out after the forces entered the camp. Palestinian youths threw stones and launched firecrackers at the forces during the clashes. A Palestinian minor was also shot while watching the clashes from the roof of his neighbors' house and died of his wounds a short time later.

data.name: Fares Husam Hussein Fahmawi
data.notes: Killed, along with 12 other Palestinians, by a missile fired from an aircraft while they were in al-Mahjar neighborhood, watching clashes that developed about 100 meters away after Israeli forces entered the camp. During the clashes, Palestinians threw stones and improvised explosive devices at the Israeli forces and fired at them. The military claimed explosive devices were thrown from his location, but B’Tselem’s research revealed a Palestinian threw an explosive device 50 meters away from where he and others were standing, and then fled to a forest about 250 meters away. Border Police officers delayed the ambulances that came to evacuate the wounded for about an hour. Five more Palestinians, two of them minors, were killed and six others were injured by the Israeli forces' fire.

data.name: Muhammad Sayel 'Abd al-Qader al-Jundi
data.notes: Wounded by soldiers' gunfire after he opened a metal gate placed by the military near his home to restrict Palestinian travel after October 7. Video footage posted on social media shows a soldier firing at al-Jundi after he opened the gate. Died of his wounds shortly after.

data.name: Hazem Ahmad 'Abd al-Fatah Qatawi
data.notes: Wounded in the shoulder by shots fired by soldiers who entered the city of Ramallah with Border Police officers. According to the military, the forces were there to seize money intended for Hamas and Islamic Jihad. Qatawi, who was in the area, took shelter in the doorway of a building along with other people, while soldiers chased Palestinians who had fired at the forces earlier. Died of his wounds shortly after. Four more Palestinians were injured by the forces' fire in clashes that broke out nearby and during which Palestinians threw stones and Molotov cocktails at them.

data.name: Ahmad Adib Khalil 'Alian
data.notes: Fatally shot by a Border Police officer and a security guard at Mazmuriya Junction after stabbing the security guard and another Border Police officer. According to media reports, the security guard was moderately injured and the Border Police officer was seriously injured. Israel is holding his body.

data.name: Mahmoud 'Othman Muhammad Warni
data.notes: Wounded in the abdomen and thigh by soldiers' gunfire near the separation fence in town, while trying to escape after throwing stones together with other youths at the military tower following a demonstration against the war in Gaza. Died of his wounds shortly after.

data.name: 'Ammar Muhammad 'Abd al-Fatah Abu Hussein
data.notes: Fatally shot by soldiers in his car after running over five soldiers at a military post. According to the military, one of the soldiers was seriously injured and the others were lightly to moderately injured. Israel is holding his body.

data.name: Muhammad Hussein Isma'il Masalmeh
data.notes: Fatally shot by soldiers after, according to the military, running over a soldier at a military post and severely wounding him. Israel is holding his body.

data.name: Ahmad Hashem 'Abd a-Rahim 'Obeidi
data.notes: Shot in the head by members of the Palestinian Authority security forces at the end of a chase, while driving his car in the camp. ‘Obeidi was an Islamic Jihad military wing operative.
